Text:
Iris times her maneuver with the enormous crash
of thunder.

When she gets in range, she strikes at Shadow's
neck with her long blade.

However, it is in vain, as Shadow takes barely a half
step back and puts himself out of range. He watches
the swing miss and prepares for his next action.
Except that Iris lets go of her sword.
*gasp*
Aaaaaah!

She crouches down and comes charging in with arms
outstretched to grab ahold of Shadow's body.

Throwing her life away to pin him down—that's where
all of her unshakable determination is focused. There
will be no time to dodge.
The next instant, Shadow drives his knee into her face.

Iris had no way of knowing this, but unarmed combat
is Shadow's strongest suit.
How futile.

Still, she served her purpose: Shadow had to stop
briefly to perform his knee strike.
That moment is more than enough.
Beatrix's flashing blow bears down on Shadow...

and her huge blade hammers into his ebony sword
with all the strength she can muster behind it.

With a tremendous crash, Shadow's weapon, hand, and
arm are overcome by the force of the impact.

The perfect opportunity arrives, and Beatrix strikes
at maximum speed to meet it.

But not even that was quick enough to beat how
how quickly Shadow lets go of his blade.

Immediately after making the split-second decision,
he vanishes... Vanishes to somewhere outside of
Beatrix's field of vision.
*gasp*

He crouches down low and grabs ahold of her at
almost ground level. However, his is a much more
flowing, more refined motion that puts Iris's prior
attempt to shame.

Shadow lifts Beatrix's body as if she weighs
nothing at all and slams her into the ground.
Gahah!
*gasp*

The stone paving cracks and the wind is knocked from
her lungs.
Urrrgh!
Something comes falling from the sky with a whoosh.
Shadow extends a hand—and catches his blade.

It is as if he had calculated every step of it...
Lightning illuminates Iris and Beatrix where
they lay.

With one last glance at his fallen opponents, Shadow
begins to walk away.
...W-Wait...
He stops at the sound of her voice.

Do not think...that you can get away with...bringing
chaos to our city...whenever it pleases you...!
Iris rises to one knee unsteadily.
Every knight in the capital...has been mobilized...

All of us here...in the entirety of Midgar...stand
against you!
There is nowhere left for you to run!!!
Heh... Heheheheh...
Heh, heheh, hahahaha! Ahahahahaha!
Hahahaha, ha!
Run?
Who's running? Running where?
And why?!
A bluish-purple radiance suddenly bathes the capital.

It is an overwhelming torrent of magic—one that
flows from Shadow's body and threatens to drown
the whole city.
This is...
No, it can't be... No!!!

Iris and Beatrix are awestruck before this force
that defies imagination.

If Shadow can wield such power, then vaporizing the
entire city would be an easy feat for him.

Iris, Beatrix... Every single person in the capital
are equally helpless in the face of such might.
Playtime is over.

...I know you might say that what I'm doing is
pointless.
...But I'm not stopping.
Even if I'd die and be reborn,
I would do this again.
//ムービー再生
Heh, this time was just for show.
Huh...?
*gasp*

Iris beholds the clear, blue sky. There is no sign of
Shadow.

The clouds, rain, and lightning...even Shadow have
all vanished...almost as if they had never been
there to begin with.
...He's gone.
...Uuuurraaaaaaaaaagh!!!

Iris's hands ball into fists and her body shakes as
she lets out a howl of pent up rage and disgrace.
Aaaaaaah!!!
Her voice rings out through the capital.
